attributes.action: Implement Article 50 of the Lisbon Treaty immediatley
attributes.additional_details:
Our so called "Leaders", from both sides of the "Brexit" debate, wring their hands, jockey for position and quit when they should be acting on the promises made in the lead up to the last general election and to the EU referendum. Meanwhile, the UK and the rest of Europe flounders in the uncertainty that "Brexit" as inevitably brought. 

The UK government must now act on the will of the people and implement Article 50 of the Lisbon treaty and take the first steps towards stabilising our economy.
attributes.background: The United Kingdom has voted to leave the European Union; a decision that is causing vast financial uncertainty and political division in the United Kingdom and across Europe. We, the undersigned, call on our government to implement Article 50 immediately.
